articles.author: Keshav Verma
articles.description:
On-chain data shows the number of new Dogecoin addresses has shot up by 1,100%, a sign that could end up being bullish for the meme coin.
 
Dogecoin Daily New Addresses Have Set A New All-Time High
 
As pointed out by an analyst, Ali, in a post on X, the DOGE network has seen some impressive growth in addresses recently. The relevant on-chain indicator here is ‚ÄúDaily New Addresses,‚Äù which keeps track of the total amount of addresses coming online for the first time on the Dogecoin blockchain every day.
 
There are a couple of reasons why new addresses would be created on the blockchain. The first and the more major factor is natural adoption, as fresh investors coming into the asset would create new addresses for themselves.
 
 
The other reason could be because of existing users generatin‚Ä¶
articles.title: Dogecoin Adoption Shoots Up 1,100%, Trailer For Future Price Action?

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description:
The recently disappeared GBTC discount may be ‚Äúa sign of industry maturing and the improved enterprise acceptance of bitcoin.‚Äù While some see the disappearance of the discount as pointing to the re-emergence of the premium to the net asset value (NAV), one expert said he sees ‚Äúthe continued parity or even a resurgence of the discount‚Äù as real possibilities.
 
The Impact of Spot Bitcoin ETF Approvals
 
On or around January 26, the discount to the net asset value (NAV) of the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) narrowed to zero for the first time in nearly three years. Since descending to 44% in June 2023, the discount has gradually shrunk and by Dec. 20, 2023, it had reached the single-digit figure of 7%.
 

 
According to Ycharts data, the last time the discount to the NAV was around zero was s‚Ä¶
articles.title: GBTC Discount Narrows to Zero; Experts Say Return of Premium to NAV Is a Possibility

articles.author: Shinobi
articles.description:
Anarchy is a very dividing word to many people, inherently drawing the idea into peoples‚Äô heads of complete and unbridled chaos. This is not on any level what Anarchy means. It is simply a system lacking rulers or a central authority, where all cooperation and coordination is done on a purely voluntary basis between peers in the system. The etymology of the original Greek word, anarhkia, itself literally just means ‚Äúwithout rulers.‚Äù An, meaning without, arkhia, meaning rulers. 
This concept is the foundational reality of why Bitcoin functions as a distributed network and protocol. There is literally no one in charge of the network. If there were, then it would not be a distributed system composed of sovereign individuals voluntarily choosing to interact with each other. 
People tend to loo‚Ä¶
articles.title: Bitcoin Is Pure Anarchy

articles.author: Nik Hoffman
articles.description:
Today, Ten31, a world leading bitcoin technology investor, has announced the Nasdaq Global Market stock exchange listing of its portfolio company, GRIID Infrastructure. This marks the first public listing for a bitcoin-focused investment fund's portfolio company,¬†according to a press release sent to Bitcoin Magazine.
GRIID, a uniquely positioned, vertically integrated bitcoin mining and energy infrastructure company, has successfully navigated the long regulatory review process to achieve this public listing. Ten31, having served as GRIID's exclusive institutional capital partner, invested through its second institutional venture fund, Low Time Preference Fund II, underscoring its commitment to supporting innovative ventures in the bitcoin and freedom technology space.
‚ÄúAs a vertically int‚Ä¶
articles.title: Ten31 Marks First Public Listing for Bitcoin-Focused Venture Fund With BTC Miner GRIID

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description:
Google has finally executed an advertising policy update announced in December, allowing some cryptocurrency finance products, like the recently approved bitcoin ETFs, to include sponsored links on its platforms. Consequently, some bitcoin ETF issuers, like Vaneck and Blackrock, are already posting ads on Google.
Google Changes Crypto Policies, Allows Bitcoin ETF Ads
Google, the software and advertisement company, has changed its advertising policies, allowing some cryptocurrency finance products to be featured in ads and sponsored links on its platform. The company announced this move in December when it announced this would focus on clarifying ‚Äúthe scope and requirements for the advertisement of cryptocurrency coin trusts.‚Äù
At the time, Google remarked that it would allow third parties t‚Ä¶
articles.title: Googles Updates Advertising Policy for Crypto, Allows ETF Ads

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
In an exciting turn of events, the cryptocurrency market is poised to extend its recent comeback, buoyed by a fresh $1 billion injection of capital from Tether, a leading stablecoin issuer. This move comes during a period of aggressive expansion for the stablecoin operator, having already added a staggering $13 billion in USDT to Ethereum and Tron platforms since October of the previous year.
 
 
Tether Market Cap On Solid Footing
 
Tether‚Äôs market capitalization now stands at an impressive $96 billion courtesy of the fresh billion-dollar minting, solidifying its position as the leading stablecoin. The company‚Äôs growth trajectory has been further bolstered by the recent collapse of major crypto entities such as Terraform Labs, Three Arrows Capital, and FTX.
 

 
 
However, Tether‚Äôs dominan‚Ä¶
articles.title: Tether Goes Nuclear: $1 Billion Mint Fuels Run At Record Market Cap

articles.title: How the Crypto Industry Responded to FinCEN's Proposed Mixer Rule

articles.author: Jared Kirui
articles.description:
Transak, a payments infrastructure provider for  
crypto and NFTs, has partnered with Visa. This collaboration  
aims to empower users globally, enabling them to convert their  
cryptocurrency holdings into local fiat currencies.
Transak's presence across 350+ leading Web3 wallets  
and platforms ensures widespread accessibility for users worldwide. From  
MetaMask to Coinbase Wallet, Transak's integration aims to simplify the  
conversion process, bringing crypto-to-fiat capabilities to the fingertips of  
millions.
Targeting Swift Crypto-to-Fiat Conversions
Sami Start, the Co-founder and CEO of Transak,  
mentioned in a statement shared with Finance Magnates on Telegram: "We believe this partnership is an inflection point for Web3 as  
a whole. Now, millions across the globe have a straightforward way to cash out  
their digital asset holdings to their local currency intuitively and in real-time. They no longer have to walk the treacherous path of compliance  
uncertainty or face risks of fraud."
Visa Direct's hallmark feature is its ability to  
process transactions swiftly, often within 30 minutes. This stands in stark  
contrast to traditional banking methods, which can entail lengthy delays,  
especially across borders. 
By integrating Visa Direct with Transak's robust  
infrastructure, users can access a seamless and efficient mechanism for  
converting crypto assets into fiat, enhancing liquidity and accessibility.
 
  
 
  
This article was written by Jared Kirui at www.financemagnates.com.
articles.title: Transak Teams Up with Visa to Enhance Crypto-to-Fiat Conversions

articles.author: Helene Braun
articles.description: The deal allows the Web3 payments infrastructure provider's users in over 145 countries to easily convert crypto into local fiat currencies.
articles.title: Web3 Payments Firm Transak Joins Visa Direct to Streamline Crypto-to-Fiat Conversion

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Fidelity‚Äôs Spot Bitcoin ETF, FBTC, recorded an impressive amount of inflows on January 29 (Day 12 of trading). Notably, the figure alone was enough to overshadow the outflows recorded by Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC. This suggests that things are beginning to stabilize for the Bitcoin ETF market as net inflows overwhelm the outflows.¬†
 
Fidelity Records $208 Million Of Inflows
 
BitMEX Research revealed in an X (formerly Twitter) post that Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC saw an inflow of $208 million on January 29. This figure more than offsets the $192 million in outflows recorded by Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC. Before now, GBTC‚Äôs outflows had been the major talking point and how they were negatively impacting BTC‚Äôs price.
 
 
However, that looks to be changing, seeing as how only FBTC‚Äôs inflow has been able to overshadow GBTC‚Ä¶
articles.title: Fidelity Plugs The GBTC Bleed: Spot Bitcoin ETFs Begin Healing With Inflows Ramping Up

articles.author: Jamie Crawley, Omkar Godbole

articles.title: First Mover Americas: Bitcoin Eclipses $43K Having Gained Nearly 10% in a Week

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description:
The latest data from Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC reveals that the trust‚Äôs bitcoin holdings have diminished to below 500,000, following a departure of 6,138.79 bitcoin from its reserves in the past day. Conversely, Blackrock‚Äôs IBIT has bolstered its bitcoin assets by 4,603.24 bitcoin, valued at $199 million.
 
GBTC‚Äôs Bitcoin Holdings Wane as Competing Funds Increase Their Caches
 

 
On Jan. 30, 2024, Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC‚Äôs bitcoin portfolio stood at 496,573.81 BTC, with an estimated market value of $21.43 billion. GBTC has experienced a significant depletion in its bitcoin reserve, with a decrease of approximately 120,506.18 BTC, equivalent to around $5.23 billion in value, since Jan. 12. On Jan. 29, the combined trade volume for all ten spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) reached $1.59 billion, with GBTC contributing $576.01 million to this figure.
 

 
While GBTC experienced a decrease, Blackrock‚Äôs IBIT witnessed growth in the past day, escalating from 52,025.76 BTC to a current tally of 56,629.00 BTC, as per the latest IBIT figures. Fidelity‚Äôs most recent update for their holdings on Jan. 30 remains pending, and as of Jan. 29, FBTC‚Äôs holdings were at 46,238.09 BTC. However, onchain data indicates an increase to 47,238 BTC. ARKB, managed by Ark Invest and 21shares, now possesses 14,790 BTC. Bitwise‚Äôs BITB maintains a reserve of 13,576.10 BTC, having observed no growth in the last day.
 

 

 

 
The rest of the ETFs have yet to refresh their holding reports. Currently, Invesco has 6,833 BTC, Vaneck possesses 2,885.46 BTC, Valkyrie owns 2,635.29 BTC, and Franklin Templeton‚Äôs holdings are at 1,363 BTC. Holding the smallest bitcoin amount among the spot bitcoin ETFs is Wisdomtree, with 201 BTC valued at $8.7 million. All nine spot BTC ETFs hold 140,250.85 BTC as of Jan. 30, 2024.
 

 
What do you think about GBTC‚Äôs cache dropping below 500K bitcoin? Share your thoughts and opinions about this subject in the comments section below.
articles.title: GBTC Holdings Dip Below 500K BTC as Rivals Ramp up Accumulation

articles.author: Guest Author
articles.description: It finally happened. Well into the second decade of the digital assets revolution, we‚Äôve finally witnessed the approval of the highly anticipated spot Bitcoin ETF. Dubbed by Michael Saylor as ‚Äúthe biggest Wall Street development in the last 30 years‚Äù, the launch of the spot Bitcoin ETF is the financial world‚Äôs first step toward ameliorating our highly archaic financial system. While there are countless explanations about how impactful the concept of decentralizing money would be for trade, commerce, and financial inclusion, what often goes overlooked are the philosophical and psychological implications of how we redefine wealth and who has it. Essentially, the introduction of the Bitcoin ETF could ultimately be regarded as the single most important catalyst in the widespread adoption and a‚Ä¶
articles.title: What Lies Ahead for Crypto Now That the Fabled Bitcoin ETF Is Here? ‚Äî Calaxy CEO Solo Ceesay

articles.author: Media
articles.description:
PRESS RELEASE. Dubai, UAE ‚Äî TOKEN2049, the leading global Web3 and crypto conference series, has unveiled the initial speaker lineup for its inaugural Dubai edition, which will be taking place from 18-19 April 2024.
 
The first round of the event‚Äôs speaker lineup has been made public.
